home.subtitle: BoxLang is a dynamic, cross-platform programming language designed to be flexible and efficient. It enables developers to write code that runs across different environments, offering versatility in application development. BoxLang focuses on simplicity and ease of use, making it suitable for various types of projects, from web to server-side applications. Its design allows for high performance and quick development cycles, adapting well to multiple platforms without the need for extensive platform-specific adjustments.
home.title: Welcome to BOXLANG
